t: Amazon.com: DANIEL SMITH 285250077 Extra Fine Secondary Watercolor Set, 3 Tubes, 15ml, Multicolor, 0.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 3)
s: Vibrant, intense color. A bit more pricey (so I researched and watched lots of comparison vids with Windsor Newton brand on youtube before taking the plunge) but a little of these colors go a long way. Daniel Smith brand is the only watercolors I will use from here on out!
